Posts.Content: Aug 31, 2010 03:42PM Nalie40 wrote: Hi ladies. I joined  a couple a days ago but has been following this forum during my whole treatment. I have had 3 rounds of FEC and 3 rounds of Taxotere, the last one was last January 8th. My hair started to come out when I  began with taxotere and now I have a head full of curls. I am eager for my hair to get longer, had it long before chemo. I still have 7 rounds of Herceptin left and will finish that in January. I feel great and I am  working fulltime again. This whole process was hard but  I  was always positive and that helped. hang in there!!!!
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Oct 21, 2010 05:47PM Nalie40 wrote: Lady I also had the mix FEC and Taxotere, and I must say that my hair was coming in while on Taxotere. I am now 9 months past chemo and hair is growing and my eyebrows and lashes came in nicely also. So do not worry about your regrowth, It will grow back. I am still on Herceptin till January.
